introduction: 1974年，巴西BOSSANOVA女歌手艾莉丝-黎晶娜与著名作曲家Tom Jobim合作完成了BOSSANOVA史上最重要的唱片之一《Elis & Tom》，本片即记录下他们创作这张经典专辑的幕后故事，影片导演同时也是艾莉丝的经纪人。In 1974, Elis Regina had 10 years in the recorder Phillips and her gift to a Elis found, with Tom Jobim in disco.Las recordings Desto disc anthology is ered in Los Angeles in 1974, and this is exatamente scenery, this jewel of transcedental incomparable.Elis artistic beauty and grandeur and Tom is a work that deserves eternal gaze, heard, felt and studied in depth, a pure portrait of the Brazilian soul.
